title: Pasta soft script/Frozen Dinners modern serif
content:
Hi,

can someone identify this fonts?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105124129im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Bild_01_6195.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105124129im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Bild_02_6359.jpg)

 [‹ (x) New UPS corporate face - UPS Sans (FF Dax rip-off) {Sam Schlesinger}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105124129/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38188 "Go to previous forum topic") [Campino Logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105124129/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38656 "Go to next forum topic")
author: chefe

comments.content:
The top script might be custom drawn. See [this entry at _The FontFeed_](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105124129/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/pillowy-soft-script-fonts/) for various alternatives.

The bottom one is plain old Bodoni.
The second one is some Bodoni, Bauer probably.

For the script, consider also [Amorinda](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105124129/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/sudtipos/amorinda_regular_ot/) and [Malbeck](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105124129/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/sudtipos/malbeck_regular_ot/).
